Job Title: Documentation Executive

Job Overview:Are you meticulous and detail-oriented? Join our growing team at Global Visa Internationals in Bangalore! As a Documentation Executive, you‚Äôll play a vital role in helping clients complete the required documents for their visa applications. This is a great opportunity if you're looking to start your journey in immigration consultancy careers in India.

What You'll Do:

  • Guide clients through organizing and preparing visa documentation.
  • Provide clear support to answer documentation-related questions.
  • Ensure forms and documents meet visa requirements and quality standards.
  • Coordinate with internal teams to validate documentation where needed.
  • Update clients on missing documents and the status of their application files.

What We're Looking For:

  • Experience: Fresher
  • Skills: Strong communication, basic computer knowledge, and attention to detail.
  • Qualities: Organized, patient, and willing to grow along with our company.
